_header: That man is best in mind
_description: ‘Certeyn rewles’ to ascertain a trustworthy man — thirteen lines, where a prose tract breaks into rhyme

BodAsh189.First Lines: That man ys best yn myndeAnd wel ymade yn kynde…
BodAsh189.Last Lines:
…to hym wel ye truste maybothe by nyght and eke
                    byday
